SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.endpoints

Interface ApiHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientQueueHandler, ClientSendHandler, StoreHandler, UsersHandler
public interface ApiHandler
Interface for API endpoint handlers.

Provides a consistent contract for HTTP request handling across all API endpoints, enabling self-registration and future plugin extensibility.

Implementations handle specific API paths (e.g., /client/send, /store, /users) and are registered with the ApiEndpoint server during startup.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getPath()
    Returns the URL path this handler is registered for.
    void
    handle(HttpExchange exchange)
    Handles an HTTP request.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles an HTTP request.

      Implementations should handle authentication, method validation, request parsing, business logic, and response generation.

      Parameters:
      exchange - The HTTP exchange containing request and response.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while processing the request.

    • getPath

      String getPath()
      Returns the URL path this handler is registered for.

      The path should start with a forward slash (e.g., "/client/send"). The handler will receive all requests matching this path prefix.

      Returns:
      The URL path for this handler.
